cast.name: 爱丽丝·罗伯茨 Alice Roberts

introduction: Professor Alice Roberts returns with a revamp of the much loved format Digging for Britain.Every year, hundreds of archaeological digs from across the British Isles find clues that add to the great historical jigsaw of Britain’s story and our ancestors’ lives.  In this series, archaeologists up and down the country have been given diary cameras to record their extraordinary discoveries as they happen, and Alice joins them on some of their most spectacular digs.  From unearthing 180 million year old giant dinosaur fossils to uncovering one of the most important Roman mosaics to be discovered in over 100 years, the rich history of the UK is revealed and examined like never before.This series Alice is joined by a new team of experts who will dig deeper to understand the story behind the finds, and the most exciting artefacts are brought into Alice’s new Digging Tent to be analysed and understood in a way that provides insight and revelation spanning 10,000 years of British history.
